      • tokens

        public static java.lang.String[] tokens(java.lang.String sentenceText)
        Tokenize a string's text, so that this and Sentence come up with the same result.
        Parameters:
        sentenceText - the String to be tokenized
        Returns:
        array of string tokens

      • summarize

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> summarize()
        Generates a summary of the sentences passed into this DocumentSummarizer. The output is a list of salient sentences, ordered from most salient to least. Currently, we just take any sentence that is locally maximal in relevance, so it's possible that the summary could have multiple entries that mean the same thing. Anecdotally, though, it work pretty well.
        Returns:
        a summary as array of string sentences
